page.title: 09THE ROLLE FAMILY
page.content: This family had many estates in this part of Devon and again in North Devon and in fact still do. Evidence of their involvement can be seen in their provision of a school given in the early 19th century and Almshouses and a church. Many of the farms around Beer were, or still are, part of the land belonging to the estate. The involvement has been continued as the new school in Beer was built on estate farmland and the present Lord and Lady Clinton laid the Foundation Stone at the school.
